name: Hero Quest: Casual RPG (Prototype)
description:
Hero Quest: Casual RPG

A 2D pixel isometric Casual RPG game where the player controls the character to automatically attack the enemy within a certain range using bow, staff or sword. Pedro got summoned to an unknown village of Khupreas, and they tell him to get the mystical key at the 10th floor of the dungeon to free them and for him to get back to his own world. Defeat unique monsters every level with an automatic attack system, dodge and run from the monster, collect the legendary set equipment. Begin your journey in another world as Hero Pedro!

Controls

Right click - Attack

WASD - movement

Q - change weapon (melee/range)

1 - skill 1

-----  next patch -----

2 - skill 2

3 - skill 3

4 - skill 4
